name: El
storyline: He wakes up in a depressing gray cell with a tiny window as the only point of light. Without knowing how, he escapes from those cement walls and embarks on a journey through the skies thanks to his umbrella. Along the way, he will discover a fantastic but hostile world and help people trapped in the mess.
summary:
After waking up in a forgotten prison, he flies off in search of a purpose.

A beautiful and melancholic mobile game in which a character represented by a black silhouette embarks on a journey flying through the skies with his umbrella. With the help of feathers that will give you power over the winds, you will advance avoiding obstacles through the different screens, discovering the most fantastic little things in a world full of hostility.
